mapper.select: SELECT title, journalcontent, time, uuid, pic1, pic2, pic3 FROM journal WHERE uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT time FROM journal WHERE time like #{date}"%" group by time
SELECT title, journalcontent, time, uuid, pic1, pic2, pic3 FROM journal order by time desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO journal ( title, journalcontent, time, uuid, pic1, pic2, pic3) VALUES (#{title},#{journalcontent}, #{time}, #{uuid}, #{pic1}, #{pic2}, #{pic3})
